ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS 60D 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens & Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
16GB SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card + Multi 50 in 1 USB Card Reader
Rechargeable LPE6 Lithium Ion Replacement Battery + 3 Piece Filter Kit Includes: UV, Circular Polarizer and Flourescent Filter and Hard Case
Full Size 50" Tripod W/Carry Bag + Padded Carrying Case w/Strap
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 60D - Digital camera - SLR - 18.0 Mpix - Canon EF-S 18-55mm IS and EF 75-300mm lenses - optical zoom: 3 x - supported memory: SD, SDXC, SDHC
